title: Exploring Opposites
description: At the Fabbrica del Vapore, INTERDEPENDENCE takes the shape of an international exhibition mixing and matching the projects of the students of Politecnico di Milano (Design, Architecture, and Engineering) with those of students from almost 50 design universities from all over the world. The exhibition collects 150 projects and is animated by a palimpsest of initiatives. The opening of the exhibition will be on Tuesday, April 16, at 18:30.

title: Human / More-than-human
description: At the Salone Satellite, a dedicated stand presents the study programs of the School of Design and showcases student’s works through an interactive installation.

title: Design X Designers
description: The Campus Bovisa Durando hosts the DesignXDesigners exhibition, with a display of works by students from the Polimi Design System.
